trans-unit.source: Implement to participate in the creation or choosing of a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object, especially to enable shared sessions.
trans-unit.target: Procedere all'implementazione per partecipare alla creazione o alla scelta di un <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> oggetto, soprattutto per abilitare le sessioni condivise.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IInstanceContextProvider interface to provide the appropriate <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object to the system.
trans-unit.target: Implementare l'interfaccia IInstanceContextProvider per fornire appropriata <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>oggetto al sistema.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this interface is implemented to support shared sessions, enable service instance pooling, control lifetimes of service instances, or to group contexts among clients.
trans-unit.target: In genere, questa interfaccia viene implementata per supportare sessioni condivise, abilitare il pool di istanza di servizio, controllare la durata delle istanze del servizio o per raggruppare i contesti fra client.

trans-unit.source: For example, to implement sharing, insert a custom IInstanceContextProvider to decide which session or call from a client is associated with which <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per implementare la condivisione, inserire un IInstanceContextProvider personalizzata per decidere quale sessione o chiamate da un client sono associata a cui <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>oggetto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio che illustra la condivisione dei contesti di istanza, vedere [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When an IInstanceContextProvider is inserted into [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], the normal property that controls the creation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects (the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property) is no longer checked and has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > IInstanceContextProvider un quando viene inserito in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], la proprietà normale che controlla la creazione di <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>oggetti (il <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà) non viene più controllata e non ha alcun effetto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: A more generic mechanism by which you can initialize <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects when created (for example, to attach custom extensions to each <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>) is the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Un meccanismo più generico da cui è possibile inizializzare <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>oggetti quando creato (ad esempio, per allegare estensioni personalizzate a ogni <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>) è <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when a new message is received.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando viene ricevuto un nuovo messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The GetExistingInstanceContext method is called when a message is received.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetExistingInstanceContext viene chiamato quando viene ricevuto un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: Return the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object that you want to process the message, or `null`.
trans-unit.target: Restituire il <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>dell'oggetto che si desidera elaborare il messaggio, o `null`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: In the case of `null`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object for the message and then calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In caso di `null`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] crea un nuovo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>oggetto per il messaggio e quindi chiama il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A>metodo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: If you return `null`, the new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object goes through the throttling system and increments the count of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se si restituisce `null`, il nuovo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>oggetto passa attraverso il sistema di limitazione delle richieste e incrementa il conteggio di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The incoming message.
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio in arrivo.

trans-unit.source: The channel that received the message.
trans-unit.target: Il canale che riceve il messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object that is used to process the message; return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to instruct [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> oggetto che viene utilizzato per elaborare il messaggio, restituirà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> per indicare [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per creare un nuovo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>oggetto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*> method.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> restituito dal <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*>metodo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*>

trans-unit.source: InitializeInstanceContext is called when <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A> returns `null` and a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is created.
trans-unit.target: InitializeInstanceContext viene chiamato quando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A>restituisce `null` e un nuovo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>viene creato l'oggetto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called to notify you that a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has been created.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato per notificare che un nuovo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>è stato creato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The incoming message.
trans-unit.target: Il messaggio in arrivo.

trans-unit.source: The channel that received the message.
trans-unit.target: Il canale che riceve il messaggio.

trans-unit.source: Called when all <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> activities have completed to enable implementers to prevent the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> from being recycled.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando tutte <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>attività sono state completate per consentire agli implementatori di impedire il <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>di essere riciclati.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: IsIdle is called when [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is about to close and recycle an idle <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object so that you can inform the runtime whether to continue doing so.
trans-unit.target: IsIdle viene chiamato quando [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] sta per chiudere e riciclare un inattività <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>dell'oggetto in modo che è possibile informare il runtime se si desidera continuare a svolgere necessaria.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio che illustra la condivisione dei contesti di istanza, vedere [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object that is considered idle.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>oggetto che viene considerato inattivo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is to close and recycle the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object and adjust the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] deve chiudere e riciclare il <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>dell'oggetto e modificare il valore di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*> method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable implementers to provide a callback to notify [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is finished.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*>restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per consentire agli implementatori di fornire un callback per notificare [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] quando il <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>oggetto termina.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*>

trans-unit.source: The NotifyIdle method is called when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> method returns `false` to enable you to provide [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> object that you use to inform the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has finished its work.
trans-unit.target: NotifyIdle viene chiamato quando il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>restituisce `false` che consente di fornire [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] con un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>che consentono di informare il runtime dell'oggetto che il <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>ha completato l'elaborazione.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has finished its work, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> once again.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>oggetto notifica il runtime che il <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>ha completato l'elaborazione, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] chiamate <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>nuovamente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: Questo ciclo continua fino a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>restituisce `true` e il contesto viene chiuso e riciclato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback"></xref> object that notifies [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is to be closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback"> </xref> oggetto notifica [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] quando il <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>oggetto viene chiuso e riciclato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> Corrente
